title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6 §§ 368-2.5 - Severability
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6 §§ 368-2.5 - Severability

State Regulations

If any provision of this Subpart or its application to
any person or circumstance is held to be invalid, the remainder of this

Subpart, and the application of that provision to persons or circumstances
other than those to which it is held invalid, shall not be affected
thereby. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6
§§
368-2.5

Adopted

New

York State Register February 23, 2022/Volume XLIV, Issue 08, eff. 3/10/2022

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
